animeTitle: Touch 3: Kimi ga Toorisugita Ato ni - Don't Pass Me By
animeDescription: Compilation movie of the third year of the Touch timeline. Contain many important plot differences, added scenes and the complete removal of an important character.  (Source: AniDB)
